section1_p1: This Privacy Policy describes how We Event collects, uses, and protects the personal information that you provide when using our service.
section1_p2: We are committed to protecting your privacy. If we ask you to provide certain information by which you can be identified when using our service, you can be assured that it will only be used in accordance with this privacy statement.
section2_p1: We may collect the following information:
section2_li2: Contact information including email address and phone number
section2_li3: Demographic information such as postal address
section2_li5: Other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers
section3_p1: We use this information to understand your needs and provide you with a better service, in particular for the following reasons:
section3_li2: Improvement of our products and services
section3_li3: Periodic sending of promotional emails about new products, special offers, or other information we think may interest you
section3_li4: To contact you for market research purposes
section3_li5: To customize our website according to your interests
section4_p1: We are committed to ensuring the security of your information. To prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, we have put in place appropriate physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.
section5_p1: A cookie is a small file that asks permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once you agree, the file is added and the cookie helps analyze web traffic or lets you know when you visit a particular site.
section5_p2: We use traffic cookies to identify which pages are being used. This helps us analyze web page data and improve our site to tailor it to customer needs. We only use this information for statistical analysis purposes and then the data is removed from the system.
section6_p1: Our website may contain links to other websites of interest. However, once you have used these links to leave our site, you should note that we have no control over that other website. Therefore, we cannot be responsible for the protection and privacy of any information you provide while visiting such sites, which are not governed by this privacy statement. You should exercise caution and look at the privacy statement applicable to the website in question.
section7_p1: You may choose to restrict the collection or use of your personal information in the following ways:
section7_li1: If you have previously agreed to us using your personal information for direct marketing purposes, you may change your mind at any time by contacting us through our contact form.
section7_li2: We will not sell, distribute, or lease your personal information to third parties unless we have your permission or are required by law to do so.
section8_p1: For any questions regarding this policy or to exercise your data protection rights, please contact us at the following email address: privacy@we-event.com
section9_p1: This privacy policy was updated on January 1, 2023. We reserve the right to modify it at any time. Changes will take effect as soon as they are published on this page.
terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.sections.acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.sections.acceptance.p1: By accessing and using the We Event service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not accept all the terms, you may not access the service.
terms.sections.service.title: 2. Service Description
terms.sections.service.p1: We Event is an exclusive platform connecting VIP clients with professional event partners. The service includes access to a curated network of partners, expert advice through exclusive podcasts, and preferential pricing for members.
terms.sections.service.p2: The service is available to registered users as VIP clients (free) or partners (paid subscription).
terms.sections.account.title: 3. Registration and Account
terms.sections.account.p1: To use the service, an account must be created with complete and accurate information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and all activities that occur under your account.
terms.sections.account.p2: You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other security breach.
terms.sections.subscription.title: 4. Partner Subscription
terms.sections.subscription.p1: The partner subscription is billed annually. The subscription price is clearly displayed before confirming registration.
terms.sections.subscription.p2: Automatic renewal: Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term unless canceled before the renewal date.
terms.sections.subscription.p3: Termination: You may cancel your subscription at any time from your account. The cancellation will take effect at the end of the current subscription period.
terms.sections.content.title: 5. Service Content
terms.sections.content.p1: Content available through the service, including podcasts, text, graphics, logos, images, and videos, is the property of We Event or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.
terms.sections.content.p2: You may not modify, publish, transmit, participate in the transfer or sale of, create derivative works from, or otherwise exploit any content from the service without our prior written consent.
terms.sections.userContent.title: 6. User Content
terms.sections.userContent.p1: By submitting content on our platform (podcasts, descriptions, messages), you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, and distribute such content.
terms.sections.userContent.p2: You warrant that the content you submit does not infringe third-party rights, including intellectual property rights, and is not illegal, obscene, defamatory, or otherwise objectionable.
terms.sections.matchmaking.title: 7. Matchmaking
terms.sections.matchmaking.p1: We Event acts solely as an intermediary between clients and partners. We are not responsible for services provided by partners and offer no warranties as to their quality.
terms.sections.matchmaking.p2: Any contract for the provision of services is concluded directly between the client and the partner, and We Event is not a party to that contract.
terms.sections.liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
terms.sections.liability.p1: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, We Event shall not be liable for any indirect, special, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits or revenue, arising from your use of the service or inability to use the service.
terms.sections.changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
terms.sections.changes.p1: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect upon being posted on our website. It is your responsibility to review our terms regularly.
terms.sections.law.title: 10. Governing Law
terms.sections.law.p1: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with French law, without regard to conflict-of-law principles.
terms.sections.contact.title: 11. Contact
terms.sections.contact.p1: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us at: contact@we-event.com
